attributes.action: Protection for vulnrable adults within care homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to have a new piece of legislation that will help to protect vulnrable adults within care homes. More and more people are being put into residential care, There seem to be more and more cases of some of these people being neglected. This is a petition to have this looked into and possibly one day stopped one day in this country there will be a massive surge of people needing to go into care with different diseases Alzheimers and Dementia when these people are no longer able to speak we muct speak out for them and ensure they have as much of a comftable life as possible..
